Bend.Bend Rainbows: The Bend Rainbows were a minor league baseball team in Bend, Oregon, from 1970 to 1971. They played in the short-season Class A Northwest League and were an affiliate of the Triple-A Hawaii Islanders of the Pacific Coast League. The Rainbows played their home games at Municipal Ball Park in the south end of Bend, today's Vince Genna Stadium.
